title: Land with house & factory for sale
details:
This is a 202P property with a three storied 4 bedroom house & 7000sqft factory space built in the year 2010 now available for quick sale.

25 coconut trees, three jack fruit trees, variety of fruit trees available on property.

Two natural water wells & a natural stream around the property.

The location is 100m away from the high level road & 2km away from the Homagama town.

NO BROKERS PLEASE
